name: CholeraTestsForVibrioCholeraeO1OrO139ByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Cholera (Tests for Vibrio cholerae O1 or O139 by Culture and Identification Method)
description: Currently, there are no species specific culture test for Toxigenic Vibrio cholerae serogroup O1 or O139
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of toxigenic Vibrio cholerae),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Vibrio cholerae toxin Ag in Isolate),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
